#pragma config(Sensor, in1,    leftline,       sensorLineFollower)
#pragma config(Sensor, in2,    centerline,     sensorLineFollower)
#pragma config(Sensor, in3,    rightline,      sensorLineFollower)
#pragma config(Sensor, dgtl11, bump,           sensorTouch)
#pragma config(Motor,  port5,           leftMotor,     tmotorVex393_MC29, openLoop, reversed)
#pragma config(Motor,  port6,           rightMotor,    tmotorVex393_MC29, openLoop)
//*!!Code automatically generated by 'ROBOTC' configuration wizard               !!*//

void straight (){
	startMotor(leftMotor, 30);
	startMotor(rightMotor, 30);
}

void turnleft (){
	startMotor(leftMotor, -30);
	startMotor(rightMotor, 30);
}

void turnright (){
	startMotor(leftMotor,  30);
	startMotor(rightMotor, -30);
}

task main (){
	
while(true)
{
	straight();
	
	if(SensorValue(leftline) >2300)
	{
		turnleft();
		untildark(2200, centerline);
	}
	
	if(SensorValue(rightline) >2300)
	{
		turnright();
		untildark(2200, centerline);
	}
	
	if(SensorValue(centerline) >2250)
	{
		straight();
	}
	
}


}
